text:
Evan Ross Biography-Wiki

Evan Ross is an American actor and musician. He made his acting debut in the comedy-drama film ATL (2006) and has since starred in the films Pride (2007), According to Greta (2009), Mooz-lum (2010), 96 Minutes (2011), Supremacy (2014), The Hunger Games: Mockingjay – Part 1 (2014) and Part 2 (2015).

Evan Ross Birthday

Ross was born as Evan Olav Næss, on August 26, 1988, in Greenwich, Connecticut.

Evan Ross Age

He is 31 years old as of 2019.

Evan Ross Height and Weight

The famous actor stands tall at a height of ‎6 feet 1 inch (1.85m). He weighs 72 kg or 159 pounds.

Evan Ross Education

Evan attended Greenwich High School in Greenwich, Connecticut. His other academic credits will be updated soon.

Evan Ross Father/Dad

Ross is the son of the late mountaineer Arne Næss Jr. and the Supremes lead singer Diana Ross. His father was of German and Norwegian descent and his mother is African-American. His parents divorced in 2000. In January 2004, Ross’ father was killed at age 66 in a climbing accident near Cape Town.

Evan Ross Mom

Diana Ernestine Earle Ross was born on March 26, 1944, and is an American singer, actress, and record producer. Born and raised in Detroit, Michigan, Diana rose to fame as the lead singer of the vocal group the Supremes, which, during the 1960s, became Motown’s most successful act, and are the best charting girl group in US history, as well as one of the world’s best-selling girl groups of all time. Read More

Evan Ross Siblings

Ross has one older brother, Ross Næss and three older maternal half-sisters; Rhonda Ross, whose biological father is Berry Gordy, and Tracee and Chudney from his mother’s marriage to Robert Ellis Silberstein. He also has three older paternal half-siblings from his father’s first marriage, Christoffer, Katinka, and Leona, and two younger paternal half-brothers from his father’s third marriage, Nicklas and Louis.

Evan Ross Wife

He has been married to singer-songwriter Ashlee Simpson since 2014, with whom he has one daughter. Their daughter, Jagger Snow Ross, was born on July 30, 2015. Ross also has one stepson, Bronx Mowgli Wentz (born November 2008), from Simpson’s previous marriage to musician Pete Wentz.

Evan Ross Salary

Ross’s yearly income is $2,424,000 from his acting, tours, and travels. He earns by add and sponsoring social platforms as well.

Evan Ross Net Worth

As of 2020, Evan has an estimated net worth of $30 million.

Evan Ross Photos

Evan Ross ATL

Ross began his career as an actor while still a student at Greenwich High School. His first major role was in the film, ATL, released in March 2006, in which he co-starred with rappers T.I. and Big Boi. Ross has appeared in several other films, including the thriller Linewatch with Cuba Gooding, Jr. (2008), the drama Gardens of the Night (2008), and the crime drama film Life Is Hot in Cracktown (2009).

He then starred as Julie, the love interest of Hilary Duff’s character, in the 2009 comedy-drama film According to Greta. Ross has also appeared in The Notorious B.I.G. music video for the song “Nasty Girl” (2005), and the Lionel Richie music video for the song “Just Go” (2009).

Ross joined the cast of The CW’s teen drama series 90210 in its third season, in 2010, portraying Liam Court’s (Matt Lanter) half-brother and the love interest to Annie Wilson, played by Shenae Grimes. He appeared that same year, in Case 219, and the critically acclaimed film festival winner Mooz-lum, also starring Danny Glover and Nia Long.

He starred in the comedy-drama The Family Tree (2011) and co-starred alongside Brittany Snow in the thriller 96 Minutes, which was released April 28, 2012, in select theaters. Ross won the Breakout Acting Award at SXSW for his performance in the film. In 2012, Ross had a supporting role in the Jay and Mark Duplass-directed comedy-drama Jeff, Who Lives at Home.

In 2007, Ross began recording his debut album. After four years in the studio, Ross released his single “Yes Me” on February 25, 2011. Ross released a sneak preview of another song, “How To Live Alone”, on his Instagram on December 5, 2014. On May 14, 2015, Ross released the song as a single, featuring rapper T.I.

Ashlee Simpson and Evan Ross

Ashlee Simpson Ross’ first dance with future husband Evan Ross made her want to la la all night because it was love at first sight! They met at a friend’s birthday party.



Ashlee Simpson and Evan Ross Wedding

In the presence of family and friends, Ashlee and Evan exchanged vows in a bohemian-themed ceremony at his mom Diana Ross’s estate in Greenwich, CT. Despite the rain, she dazzled in a gown decorated with pearls. The bride’s family played an adorable role in the ceremony. Her son, Bronx Wentz, had the honor of walking his mom down the aisle. Meanwhile, Ashlee Simpson’s sister, Jessica Simpson, was a bridesmaid while her daughter, Maxwell, acted as a flower girl.

The bridal party was made up of sister Jessica Simson the maid of honor, and other bridesmaids Kelly Blair, Kimberly Ryan, Alicia Sevani, Yisney Terrero, Nia Sanchez, Chudney Ross, Rhonda Ross, Tracee Ross CaCee Cobb.

Ross Ness served as the as the best man, while the groomsmen was lit up by Donald Faison, Jessica Simpson’s husband Eric Johnson, Gregory Andrews, Jovar Andrews, Dallas Austin, Jaz-man Bennett, Paul Blair, Daniel Booko, Tony DeNiro, Josh Faulkner, De’Vaughn Nixon, V Sevani and Jessy Terrero.

Evan Ross Hunger Games

The Hunger Games series generated more than $2 billion in worldwide box office revenue and produced a megastar in Jennifer Lawrence, the franchise also showcased a few young stars with its supporting cast: Liam Hemsworth, Amandla Stenberg, Willow Shields and Evan Ross.

With the Games destroyed, Katniss Everdeen, along with Gale, Finnick and Beetee, end up in the so thought “destroyed” District 13. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her friends, Katniss becomes the “Mockingjay”, the symbol of rebellion for the districts of Panem.

Evan Ross Gay

Evan Ross is making a name for himself in the role of a gay man with AIDS in producer Queen Latifah‘s new HBO film Life Support. Evan plays a self-destructive gay HIV-positive teenager, Amare, who Latifah’s character is trying to save. The film shines a light on people not often represented on the screen: African-American women and men living with HIV and AIDS, including men living on the “down-low” like Amares lover, Michael.

Evan Ross Ethnicity

He was born to a father of German and Norwegian descent and his mother is African-American.

Evan Ross Ashlee Simpson Song ‘I Do’

Ashlee Simpson-Ross is releasing her first single with her husband, actor and musician Evan Ross, this Friday. The 33-year-old singer and actress made the announcement about the forthcoming track “I Do” via Twitter on Tuesday morning.

“I’m so excited to finally announce our first single, I Do, is coming out this Friday!!” she tweeted, adding a few heart emojis and a picture of the two together.

The announcement comes ahead of the premiere of the married couple’s new reality series, Ashlee and Evan, slated to premiere on E! this Sunday, September 9 at 10 PM ET. The couple appeared on New York Live on Tuesday to promote the show and a forthcoming album.

“For now, it was a time for us where we’re making music together, and we really wanted people to come on that journey with us and have a deeper look into our lives,” Simpson-Ross said of why they chose to make the reality show now.

“It started with us just documenting us making the album. And then, in the process, we kind of realized most of the inspiration was coming from our home life, our children, and things like that,” Ross added.

The two recently celebrated their fourth anniversary on Friday (August 31) by both sharing Instagram posts on their respective pages. See Simpson-Ross’ post below and look out for the couple’s new single, “I Do,” on September 7.

Who is Evan Ross?

He is an American actor and musician. Ross is the son of the late mountaineer Arne Næss Jr. and the Supremes lead singer Diana Ross.

How old is Evan Ross?

He was born as Evan Olav Næss, on August 26, 1988, in Greenwich, Connecticut.

The famous actor stands tall at a height of ‎6 feet 1 inch (1.85m).

He has been married to singer-songwriter Ashlee Simpson since 2014, with whom he has one daughter.

How much is Evan Ross worth?

How much does Evan Ross make?

Ross’s yearly income is $2,424,000 from his acting, tours, and travels. He earns by add and sponsoring social platforms as well.

Where does Ross live?

He is a resident of Los Angeles, USA, we shall upload pictures of her house as soon as we have them.

Is Ross dead or alive?

Evan is alive and in good health. There have been no reports of him being sick or having any health-related issues.

Where is Ross Now?

Evan is still an active participant in the creative entertainment industry, he is a cast member of the newly unreleased The United States vs. Billie Holiday an upcoming biographical drama directed by Lee Daniels.
